title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.8 - Service of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.8 - Service of rules

State Regulations

Every notice of hearing served shall be served with a copy of
these rules, a plain language summary of these rules, a copy of articles 3, 4
and 5 of the State Administrative Procedure Act and relevant definitions under
section 102 of the State Administrative Procedure Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6218.8

Adopted

New

York State Register November 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 45, eff. 11/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
